The Beagle continued its voyage, dropping anchor next at the Cape

Verde Islands off the west coast

of Africa.

What…

what’s that?

Isn’t it just a bunch of barren lava rocks?

The ground here

must have become inhospitable to life

due to the heat of

the tropical sun and

volcanic eruptions.

But being able to find palm trees in such

a desolate place is

still quite amazing.

Indeed.

62
